name: fast-content-type-parse
description: Parse HTTP Content-Type header according to RFC 7231

scripts.benchmark: node benchmarks/simple.js && node benchmarks/simple-ows.js && node benchmarks/with-param.js && node benchmarks/with-param-quoted.js
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:typescript

author: Aras Abbasi <aras.abbasi@gmail.com>
